marketplaces.name: martinemde-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Claude Code extensions including agents, skills, and commands for enhanced development workflows
marketplaces.repo_description: My claude plugins, authored by me or copied from elsewhere

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "martinemde-marketplace",
  "metadata": {
    "description": "Claude Code extensions including agents, skills, and commands for enhanced development workflows",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "pluginRoot": "./plugins"
  },
  "owner": {
    "name": "Martin Emde",
    "email": "[email protected]"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "pr-feedback-reviewer",
      "source": "./agents/pr-feedback-reviewer",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Analyzes pull request feedback and comments, validates their validity, and provides prioritized recommendations for addressing concerns",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["agent", "pr", "review", "feedback", "github"],
      "category": "review"
    },
    {
      "name": "code-reviewer",
      "source": "./agents/reviewer",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Senior-engineer level code and document reviewer that enforces modern patterns, scope boundaries, and code quality standards",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["agent", "review", "code-quality", "documentation"],
      "category": "review"
    },
    {
      "name": "shell-wizard",
      "source": "./agents/shell-wizard",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Writes production-quality shell scripts following best practices with safety headers, error handling, and modern patterns",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["agent", "shell", "bash", "scripting"],
      "category": "development"
    },
    {
      "name": "dhh-code-reviewer",
      "source": "./agents/dhh-code-reviewer",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Reviews Ruby and JavaScript code against DHH's exacting standards for elegance, expressiveness, and idiomatic Rails/Hotwire style",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["agent", "review", "ruby", "rails", "javascript", "dhh"],
      "category": "review"
    },
    {
      "name": "linus-torvalds",
      "source": "./agents/linus",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Reviews code with Linus Torvalds' brutal honesty - technically precise criticism for systems code, security, and correctness",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["agent", "review", "systems", "security", "c"],
      "category": "review"
    },
    {
      "name": "jujutsu-skill",
      "source": "./skills/use-jj-not-git",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Comprehensive guidance for using Jujutsu (jj) version control system instead of Git, including concepts, commands, and GitHub integration",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["skill", "jujutsu", "jj", "vcs", "version-control"],
      "category": "tools"
    },
    {
      "name": "gitingest",
      "source": "./commands/gitingest",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Fetch and contextualize GitHub repositories for future reference, generating structured documentation",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["command", "github", "repository", "documentation"],
      "category": "tools"
    },
    {
      "name": "tdd",
      "source": "./commands/tdd",
      "strict": false,
      "description": "Follow the Test-Driven Development red-green-refactor cycle for implementing features",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": ["command", "tdd", "testing", "red-green-refactor"],
      "category": "development"
    }
  ]
}

plugins.name: pr-feedback-reviewer
